title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery          The magic of the mountains can be shared with the world through pictures. If you like taking pictures, then consider entering our annual Spirit of the Mountains Photo Contest. Maybe your memory will inspire someone else to create their own. The park shares many of its photos on its Flickr page and allows free viewing and downloading of all the photos it shares with the public. You can view and download the park's photo albums by clicking here .  Â                 Wildlife   142 Photos  Images of the astounding variety of wildlife found in the Santa Monica Mountains.          Hikes   1 Photos  Some of the many scenic hikes in the Santa Monica Mountains.          EKiP   15 Photos  Every Kid in a Park events.            Events   27 Photos  The Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area hosts a wide variety of events for the public to enjoy.          Flora   19 Photos  The diverse flora of the Santa Monica Mountains.          People   54 Photos  The Santa Monica Mountains attracts a wide variety of visitors every day!            Fire   39 Photos  The Santa Monica Mountains has a long history of wildfires, the most recent being the Camarillo Springs Fire of 2013.          Landscape   31 Photos  The Santa Monica Mountains has a huge variety of natural beauty to offer!          Historic   26 Photos  The historic sights that illustrate the rich history of the Santa Monica Mountains.
